price: 221. Ma idiin sheegaa (dadow) kan ay ku soo degaan shaydaammada?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
